translations: n.恭维（compliment 的复数）；问候；道贺
v.祝贺（compliment 的三单形式）；向……致贺辞

sentences.sentence: She simply lapped up all the compliments.
sentences.translation: 什么恭维话她都照单全收。

sentences.sentence: His compliments disconcerted her a little.
sentences.translation: 他的恭维让她有点儿尴尬。

sentences.sentence: You can do no harm by paying a woman compliments.
sentences.translation: 对女人讲恭维话不会有什么害处。
